name: QLThumbnailError.Code
desc: Error codes that may be returned when generating a thumbnail.

items.name: case generationFailed
items.desc: The thumbnail couldn’t be created for the given file.

items.name: case noCachedThumbnail
items.desc: A low-quality thumbnail couldn’t be created.

items.name: case noCloudThumbnail
items.desc: The thumbnail for a remote file couldn’t be created.

items.name: case requestCancelled
items.desc: The request to create a thumbnail was canceled.

items.name: case requestInvalid
items.desc: The request to create a thumbnail was invalid, for example, there’s no file at a provided URL.

items.name: case savingToURLFailed
items.desc: The thumbnail couldn’t be saved at the given URL.
